sentences.en: a game with a dramatic finale
sentences.cn: 结局颇具戏剧性的一场比赛

sentences.en: A special device elevated the stage for the finale.
sentences.cn: 演最后一幕时,一种特殊装置把舞台升高了.

sentences.en: Fine tannin with sweet touches in the finale.
sentences.cn: 极好的单宁,带者美妙的甜味收结.

sentences.en: He was injuried seriously at the finale match.
sentences.cn: 在最后一场比赛中他受了重伤.

sentences.en: I just saw the series finale of my favorite TV show.
sentences.cn: 我刚看了我最喜欢的电视结局.

sentences.en: Last weekend was also the finale of My Hero.
sentences.cn: 上周末是好男儿的终极之战.

sentences.en: The evening ended with a grand finale of fireworks and music.
sentences.cn: 晚会在烟花和音乐声中隆重收场了.

sentences.en: The finale had 50,000 adults standing in open-mouthed wonderment.
sentences.cn: 终场一幕让50,000名成年观众惊叹得张大嘴站了起来。

sentences.en: the finale of a Broadway show
sentences.cn: 一出百老汇表演的终场

sentences.en: The match had a thrilling finale, with three goals scored in the last five minutes.
sentences.cn: 比赛结尾非常精彩, 最后5分钟连进3球.

sentences.en: the rousing finale of Beethoven's Ninth Symphony
sentences.cn: 贝多芬第九交响曲激动人心的末乐章

sentences.en: The season finale will have you gasping for more.
sentences.cn: 这个赛季的决赛将让你更加期待.

sentences.en: They played important roles in the grand finale of the opening ceremony.
sentences.cn: 他们在开幕式的压轴戏中担当主要角色.

sentences.en: This finale is correlative with his viewpoint of nihilism an d humanitarianism.
sentences.cn: 这种结局与周氏的虚无主义和个人主义的人道主义世界观密不可分.

sentences.en: This victory provided a fitting finale to a brilliant season for the club.
sentences.cn: 这次胜利给俱乐部辉煌的赛季画上了圆满的句号.

sentences.en: Torre chose the latter, and the Yankees lost the season finale.
sentences.cn: 托瑞选择后者, 洋基队当时输了球季的最后一场比赛.

sentences.en: Whispering flowers bloom impermanence, Qu finale Sanqu sometimes both.
sentences.cn: 花开花落花无常, 曲终曲散曲双亡.

words.tran_cn: 最终的；决定性的；不可更改的
决赛；期末考试；当日报纸的末版
定局；终结；结尾；最后的事物；最后的言行

trans.tran_cn: [乐]终曲，结局，大团圆，最后一场，最后乐章，尾声
trans.tran_en: the last part of a piece of music or of a show, event etc
